Projects

Here are various projects I've worked on.

Sherman's March: An HTML5 application, built with the CreateJS library. Ported from Flash.

NAS Dome Explorer: An augmented reality application for the iPad. Ported from XCode to Unity3d.

Deku: A semester project from my Software Engineering course. Used Backbone.js and Flask to build a small social network aimed at students.
